title: Ice hockey players in Finland 2010/11 - 2017/18
summary: The statistics depicts the Number of registered Ice hockey players in Finland from 2010/11 to 2016/17 .
In the 2017/18 season , there were a total of 56626 registered Ice hockey players in Finland according to the International Ice hockey Federation .
gold: The statistics shows the number of registered ice hockey players in Finland from 2010/11 to 2017/18.
The number of registered ice hockey players in 2017/18 amounted to nearly 73.4 thousand.
The highest player number was reported in the previous season ( 2016/17 ) with over 76 thousand players .
